title: Herb Garden Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Organic, Raw, Thai, Buffet, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Bakery, British, Caribbean, Catering, English, European, French, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A green, friendly & relaxed internet cafe with free wi-fi. Uses locally sourced ingredients. Has plenty of vegan choices. Atmosphere is boho-y and comfy. Breastfeeding-friendly. Has a baby changing area, sofa seating, magazines & papers. Community-centric.
